changes: Modified cloneElement and button rendering to include onKeyDown event handler

patterns_discovered: Conditional rendering based on asChild prop
gotchas_discovered: Need to use e.preventDefault() and e.stopPropagation() to prevent default keyboard behavior
Handling keyboard events requires separate logic from click events

approach_outcome.description: Enable Enter and Space keys to toggle dropdown open/closed state on trigger button

recommendations: Consider adding tabIndex if not already present
Implement similar keyboard support for other interactive components
